description:
Christian, the successor of a long-established venerable dukedom, is a narcissist who has never been in a relationship because he adored himself too much. But a woman is hiding in his bedroom every night?

“Master, you look wonderful from head to toe as usual.”

Declared the maid, Lynn, to the master she admired.

“Stop lying about being a fan. What kind of fan would do this? Tell me who sent you right now!”

He had to kick out this suspicious maid. Yet, Christian’s heart was unwilling.

A romantic battle between a stalkerish maid x narcissistic master!>
